attributes.heading: Events Tailwind
attributes.leadingSentence: Events Tailwind proudly plays an important role in the culture of our region.

attributes.heading: Sign up for our newsletter
attributes.blurb: Stay in touch with all the latest Events Tailwind events happening in our area and other related news. You can cancel your newsletter at any time.

sections.description: A section including a form for signing up to a newsletter and description for why to sign up.

attributes.heading: Sign up for our newsletter
attributes.blurb: Stay in touch with all the latest Events Tailwind events happening in our area and other related news. You can cancel your newsletter at any time.

sections.description: A section including a blockquote.

attributes.quote: The Events Tailwind was formed to present concerts and other entertainment for our local community. Our aim is to support our arts culture by promoting the enjoyment and encouragement of the performing arts.

sections.description: A call-to-action to encourage users to view events.

attributes.heading: The latest events in our area

sections.description: The Events List section.

attributes.title: Events | Events Tailwind Built.JS Theme
attributes.description: Events page for a site built with the Events Tailwind Built.JS Theme.

sections.description: The Subscribe page landing area.

attributes.heading: Continuous support allows us to do what we do.
attributes.body: By becoming a subscriber, you help us present memorable concerts. We are a not-for-profit charity which needs the support of passionate music lovers to ensure we continue to offer top quality concerts to our community. Each year a concert or other event is held exclusively for Subscribers and Donors as a thank you for their support.

sections.description: The FAQ section on the Subscribe page.

attributes.title: Subscribe | Subscribe Tailwind Built.JS Theme
attributes.description: Subscribe page for a site built with the Events Tailwind Built.JS Theme.

sections.description: Call-to-action for donation.

attributes.heading: Want to make a donation?
attributes.blurb: We depend on the generosity of individual donors who make it possible for us to present world-class concerts in our area.

sections.description: Call-to-action for subscribing.

attributes.heading: Want to become a Subscriber?
attributes.blurb: When you choose to partner with us by becoming a Events Tailwind supporter, you help enable remarkable musical experiences right here.

sections.description: The Donate page landing area.

attributes.heading: Your donation will make all the difference.
attributes.blurb: We depend on the generosity of donors which enables us to present more expensive concerts, while keeping admission prices affordable. The Events Tailwind appreciates your donations. Thank you for being generous.
attributes.benefitHeading1: Bringing world-class musicians to our city.
attributes.benefitBlurb1: Enjoying live performances with friends and fellow music-lovers.
attributes.benefitHeading2: Providing performers with the opportunity to share their talents with us.
attributes.benefitBlurb2: Contributing to the culture of our local community.
attributes.benefitHeading3: Enabling the Events Tailwind to invite top performers to our city.
attributes.benefitBlurb3: Helping with the cost of publicity and other costs.

attributes.title: Donate | Donate Tailwind Built.JS Theme
attributes.description: Donate page for a site built with the Events Tailwind Built.JS Theme.

sections.description: List of sponsors with description and call to action.

attributes.heading: Our Sponsors
attributes.body: We are delighted to acknowledge the assistance of our sponsors who assist in making a significant difference to the work of Events Tailwind. Our sponsors help ensure that our activities are able to flourish, and that the highest quality music is available to us here. If you would like to join our list of official sponsors and support live music, please get in touch.

attributes.title: Volunteer | Events Tailwind Built.JS Theme
attributes.description: Volunteer page for a site built with the Events Tailwind Built.JS Theme.

sections.description: A volunteer call-to-action to encourage users to become a volunteer.

attributes.heading: Get involved
attributes.body: Encourage people to come and enjoy our concerts by telling your friends, neighbours, people you see socially, and new arrivals to our city about our concerts. Don't forget those who live on their own.

sections.description: An About call-to-action.

attributes.heading: Events Tailwind
attributes.blurb: Music has a wonderful ability to inspire people. It forms a common connection and brings us together to enjoy performances by wonderful musicians.
attributes.body: Bringing top musicians to our city, Events Tailwind is committed to creating opportunities for locals and visitors to experience the very best of the world's musicians.

sections.description: A support call-to-action.

attributes.heading: How to Support Us
attributes.blurb: Music has a wonderful ability to inspire people. It forms a common connection and brings us together to enjoy performances by wonderful musicians.
attributes.body: Bringing top musicians to our city, Events Tailwind is committed to creating opportunities for locals and visitors to experience the very best of the world's musicians.
attributes.blurb1: Become a subscriber and enjoy a special concert organised annually for just subscribers and donors. For only $10 (subscription fee) per person, you get that nice warm feeling of supporting us!
attributes.blurb2: Make a donation to help us bring the best performers to our city. The generosity of donors enables us to present more expensive concerts, while keeping admission prices affordable. For donations of $5 or more you can claim a tax credit.
